Text: I'm so tired...
You're telling me...

We brought the boar back. So don't do any stupid
surprise experiments.
Ugh, my sample...

Either way, you have to fix this yourself. I also
need to report this to Lady Alpha.

And besides...I'm pooped. Going over mountains
and crossing rivers all to chase a boar...was more
exhausting than I thought it'd be...
And you were carrying me.

If you don't train your body even the slightest, then
you're going to pay for it when the time comes.
Because I can't always be there to save you.

Thank you... Here is some water...to show my
appreciation...

My, that's unusually thoughtful of you. I am thirsty
after all, *chug, chug*...
It's hard to drink with you staring at me like that...

You're looking at me like I'm one of your subjects...
Hm? This water tastes funny…
Don't tell me, this is...!
My second prototype Energy Drink.
Wh-What did you make me drink?!
You chose to drink it...

You lied to me that it was water, and took advantage
of me being tired! Wh-What's going to happen to me
now?!

This is an improved prototype... It should be fine
this time.

Guess I'll have to take your word for it...
I feel like my heart is racing...

Could I be feeling nervous...? I can really feel
my heart throbbing.

How does it feel...? Come on, how do you feel
now...?
Ack...show some concern...

I am concerned...but my research is more important...
It is my top priority...
You're truly a troubled child just like Delta!
No, I can't hold it anymore... I, I...!
What? What can't you hold anymore...?

I want to...! I want to write!!! I want to write it
down!!!
Write it down?

Lord Shadow's words are taking form within my head!
I must write them all down!!!

With all this inspiration I'm getting, I must write
them now! Right now!
Eta! I'm gonna seclude myself!!!
Good luck with that.

I won't come out until I'm done writing, so just
let everyone know not to worry!!
Don't forget about your thoughts on the drink...

Ahhh, I can't take it anymore, lend me some of that
paper! And a pen!!!
It's the paper I use...for my reports...

I feel so hot that my very core is burning,
and I feel energy flowing from the tips of
my fingers to the ends of my hair—
Wow, she can't stop writing...

I can only write the words that I am thinking, no,
the words that come into my head...

It is as if a muse has descended...but before I can
think, my fingers write the words and—
I have finished my report! This should do!
Oh, let me see...

With all these adjectives and metaphors, it doesn't
qualify as a report... It needs more quantitative
and detailed expressions...

I'll do that once I cool off! This is all I've got
for now!
I will not let this inspiration go to waste!!!
She left...

I was hoping to ask her for more detail...
For data collecting purposes...
But, this should do for today...

It seems that my Energy Drink was a success...
*yawn*...

I guess I should sleep now. Time to call it a
day... Nighty night...

On that night, Eta enjoys a deep sleep for the first
time in ages.

As for Beta, she spends the night writing the latest
entry of The Chronicles of Master Shadow—

After pushing herself so hard she falls into a slump,
and can no longer write.
